name: Wee Whale Plush Toy - Handmade
description:
Welcome to the magical world of Cheeky Beasts! Fun loving characters from far far away places… well, from Seattle Washington actually. So, not so far far away for some, but far far away for others.

About Whale_
This little whale is very wise, loving, and calm. A cute palm sized morsel perfect for hanging from a doorknob, backpack, car rearview mirror, and more. Where will you hang your Cheeky Beast Whale from?!

Probably the cutest whale that there ever was, in my opinion. (Though my opinion could be considered bias because I’m the artist)

Body size_ 4” long, 3” high, 2.5” wide. Elastic cord is 4.5” long.

Handmade_ New polyester fleece. New polyfill fiber batting. New plastic safety eyes. This item is handmade by sewing machine in a smoke free pet free environment.

name: Wee Teddy Bear Plush Toy Handmade

Welcome to the magical world of Cheeky Beasts! Fun loving characters from far far away places… well, from Seattle Washington actually. So, not so far far away for some, but far far away for others.

About Teddy Bear_
This little bear is very intelligent, but a tad lazy. Ambition, yeah, not so much. A cute palm sized morsel perfect for hanging from a doorknob, backpack, car rearview mirror, and more. Where will you hang your Cheeky Beast Teddy Bear from?!

Probably the cutest teddy bear that there ever was, in my opinion. (Though my opinion could be considered bias because I’m the artist)

Body size_ About 4” from foot to tail. About 3.5” from foot to ear. Elastic cord is 4.5” long.

Handmade_ New polyester fleece. New polyfill fiber batting. New plastic safety eyes. This item is handmade by sewing machine in a smoke free pet free environment.
